text: Ara tini nagarite prabesa karalena, yakhana era adhibasira chila asatarka [1]. Sekhane tini duti lokake sangharse lipta dekhalena, ekajana tara nija dalera ebam an'yajana tara sakradalera. Atahpara musara dalera lokati ora satrura birud'dhe tara sahayya prarthana karala, takhana musa take ghusi maralena [2]; ebhabe tini take hatya kare basalena. Musa balalena, â€˜eta sayatanera kanda [3]. Se to prakasya satru o bibhrantakari.â€™
